It might be the right choice, but maybe not. If we do recommend responsive we need to be smarter than the average marketer and offer some useful guidance on how to do it right. We've got a deep-dive into the data and theories behind user behaviour, search visibility, and more. Read this post By: Eric Enge July 10, 2015 UX, Content Quality, and SEO SEO Basics | Whiteboard Friday | User Experience (UX) The experience your users have on your site has a very real impact on your ability to rank in the SERPs. In today's second episode of Whiteboard Friday, Eric Enge illustrates that important connection. However, there's a way to do such testing at a reasonable cost and, most important, with no drop off in quality.For the sake of comparison, I'm looking at the pricing of two tools: UserTesting.com and... Read this post By: Alex Johnson March 24, 2015 How to Use Bootstrap Basics to Enhance User Experience Design | User Experience (UX) If you're serious about creating the best user experience possible for your website's visitors, a few Bootstrap basics can help greatly. Read this post By: Adam Thompson March 5, 2015 Case Study: How An OpenCart Store Used Caching To Improve Page Load Speed Technical SEO | E-Commerce SEO | User Experience (UX) Page load speed is an important factor in optimizing website performance. These tips will have your ecommerce pages loading faster in no time. Read this post By: Brian Hughes February 4, 2015 How to Prevent Hackers from Using Bad Bots To Exploit Your Website Advanced SEO | User Experience (UX) Bandit bots are always circling, looking for an opportunity to attack your site. Make certain you aren't an easy victim. Read this post By: Ian Lurie October 29, 2014 It's Time to Treat Content as Part of the User Experience Content Marketing | Marketing Industry | User Experience (UX) We need to fundamentally change our approach to content. It's not an add-on or a separate thing. It's an inseparable part of the user experience. Let's act that way. Read this post By: Mackenzie Fogelson October 15, 2014 4 Ways to Build Trust and Humanize Your Brand Content Marketing | Branding | User Experience (UX) Humanizing and building trust with your brand can provide you with a strategic advantage over your competition. You must be real and authentic, listen and take action on what you hear, prioritize the relationship itself, and deliver on the promises you make.
